FAQ
================

What is this project about?
---------------------------
This project focuses on distributed energy systems, aiming to provide solutions for efficient energy distribution and management.

How can I contribute?
----------------------
You can contribute by submitting pull requests, reporting issues, or suggesting improvements through the GitHub repository.

Where can I find the documentation?
------------------------------------
The documentation is available in the `docs` folder of the repository and is continuously updated.

Who maintains this project?
---------------------------
The project is maintained by Valeria Amato.
